title: This Book Needs No Title: A Budget of Living Paradoxes
description: From Simon & Schuster, This Book Needs No Title is Raymond Smullyan's budget of living paradoxesâ€”the author of What is the Name of This Book?Including eighty paradoxes, logical labyrinths, and intriguing enigmas progress from light fables and fancies to challenging Zen exercises and a novella and probe the timeless questions of philosophy and life.
author: Raymond M. Smullyan
